name: Emergent BioSolutions
goal: As a global specialty pharmaceutical company, Emergent offers specialised products to healthcare providers and governments to address medical needs and emerging health threats.
interests: External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Emergent develops specialised products and medical countermeasures for healthcare professionals and governments to protect nations against CBRN threats.

Areas of EU focus: Public health, cross-border health threats, security, medicinal products for human use, internal security, crisis management, counter-terrorism, EU CBRN Action Plan.
